p.a: Event: Tentative Last Day of School - Early Dismissal

div.p:
April 17, 2020
This afternoon, Governor Pritzker announced that all Illinois schools will remain closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. Illinois schools across the state will not resume in-person instruction until fall and will continue with Remote Learning days for instruction throughout April and May. We will communicate more information next week after our Remote Learning Plan day, on Monday, April 20th.

STUDENT MEALS
Somonauk is offering free meals to any Somonauk Student and any sibling 18 years or younger. Starting Monday, April 13, a small breakfast will also be included with the lunch. The "Grab and Go" meals can be picked up at Somonauk High School on Mondays and Wednesdays between 11:00 am and 1:00 pm.

Somonauk School District is providing free lunch for children 18 years and younger.
"Grab and Go" lunches are available for April 6-15. If you are interested, please submit form.
The YMCA will be providing a Grab and Go DINNER during the Pandemic for children 18 and under. It will start March 30th.

Somonauk School District #432 is offering "Grab and Go Lunches" for all of our students and their siblings under the age of 18 during the week of March 30- April 3.
Pick up will be on Monday and Thursday at Somonauk High School between the hours of 11:00 am and 1:00 pm.
Please complete the form below if you are interested in receiving lunches.
